00014 template<class GV>
00015 void ref_P1(const GV& gv, const std::vector<int>& elementIndexToEntity,
00016              const std::vector<int>& boundaryIndexToEntity)
00017 {
00018   // We want to know the total calulation time
00019   Dune::Timer timer;
00020 
00021   // some typedef
00022   const int dim = GV::dimension;
00023   typedef typename GV::Grid::ctype ctype;
00024 
00025   // <<<1>>> Setup the problem from mesh file
00026 
00027   // inner region
00028   typedef Regions<GV,double,std::vector<int>> M;
00029   M m(gv, elementIndexToEntity);
00030   // boundary conditioon type
00031   typedef BCType<GV,std::vector<int>> B;
00032   B b(gv, boundaryIndexToEntity);
00033   // Class defining Dirichlet B.C.
00034   typedef BCExtension<GV,double,std::vector<int>> G;
00035   G g(gv, boundaryIndexToEntity);
00036   // boundary fluxes - this one is for the reference solution!
00037   typedef RefBoundaryFlux<GV,double,std::vector<int> > J;
00038   J j(gv, boundaryIndexToEntity);
00039 
00040   // Create finite element map
00041   typedef Dune::PDELab::P1LocalFiniteElementMap<ctype,Real,dim> FEM;
00042   FEM fem;
00043 
00044   // <<<2>>> Make grid function space
00045   typedef Dune::PDELab::OverlappingConformingDirichletConstraints CON;
00046   CON con;
00047   // Define ISTL Vector backend - template argument is the blocksize!
00048   typedef Dune::PDELab::ISTLVectorBackend<1> VBE;
00049   typedef Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionSpace<GV,FEM,CON,VBE> GFS;
00050   GFS gfs(gv,fem,con);
00051 
00052   // Create coefficient vector (with zero values)
00053   typedef typename GFS::template VectorContainer<Real>::Type U;
00054   U u(gfs,0.0);
00055   
00056   // <<<3>>> Make FE function extending Dirichlet boundary conditions
00057   typedef typename GFS::template ConstraintsContainer<Real>::Type CC;
00058   CC cc;
00059   Dune::PDELab::constraints(b,gfs,cc); 
00060   // if (helper.rank==0)
00061   //   std::cout << "constrained dofs=" << cc.size() 
00062   //             << " of " << gfs.globalSize() << std::endl;
00063 
00064   // interpolate coefficient vector
00065   Dune::PDELab::interpolate(g,gfs,u);
00066 
00067   // <<<4>>> Make Grid Operator Space
00068   typedef RefLocalOperator<M,B,J> LOP;
00069   LOP lop(m,b,j);
00070   typedef Dune::PDELab::ISTLBCRSMatrixBackend<1,1> MBE;
00071   typedef Dune::PDELab::GridOperatorSpace<GFS,GFS,LOP,CC,CC,MBE,true> GOS;
00072   GOS gos(gfs,cc,gfs,cc,lop);
00073 
00074   // <<<5a>>> Select a linear solver backend
00075   // typedef Dune::PDELab::ISTLBackend_OVLP_BCGS_SSORk<GFS,CC> LS;
00076   // LS ls(gfs,cc,5000,5,1);
00077   typedef Dune::PDELab::ISTLBackend_BCGS_AMG_SSOR<GFS> LS;
00078   LS ls(gfs);
00079   // typedef Dune::PDELab::ISTLBackend_OVLP_CG_SSORk<GFS, CC> LS;
00080   // LS ls(gfs,cc);
00081 
00082 /*  typedef Dune::PDELab::StationaryLinearProblemSolver<GOS,LS,U> SLP;
00083   SLP slp(gos,u,ls,1e-10);
00084   slp.apply();
00085 */
00086   // <<<5b>>> Solve nonlinear problem
00087   typedef Dune::PDELab::Newton<GOS,LS,U> NEWTON;
00088   NEWTON newton(gos,u,ls);
00089   newton.setLineSearchStrategy(newton.hackbuschReuskenAcceptBest);
00090   newton.setReassembleThreshold(0.0);
00091   newton.setVerbosityLevel(0);
00092   newton.setReduction(1e-10);
00093   newton.setMinLinearReduction(1e-4);
00094   newton.setMaxIterations(25);
00095   newton.setLineSearchMaxIterations(10);
00096   newton.apply();
00097 
00098   // <<<6>>> graphical output
00099   typedef Dune::PDELab::DiscreteGridFunction<GFS,U> DGF;
00100   DGF udgf(gfs,u);
00101   Dune::VTKWriter<GV> vtkwriter(gv,Dune::VTKOptions::conforming);
00102   vtkwriter.addVertexData(new Dune::PDELab::VTKGridFunctionAdapter<DGF>(udgf,"solution"));
00103   vtkwriter.write("reference",Dune::VTK::appendedraw);
00104 
00105   // Gnuplot output
00106   Dune::GnuplotWriter<GV> gnuplotwriter(gv);
00107   gnuplotwriter.addVertexData(u,"solution");
00108   gnuplotwriter.write("reference.dat"); 
00109   
00110   std::cout << "Reference total calculation time=" << timer.elapsed() << std::endl;
00111 }
